content: Hello Sujith! Nice to meet you. I'm Master, the hiring officer, and I'll be conducting a technical round of the job interview today. Please make yourself comfortable and lets get started. Can you tell me about your experience with the Full Stack Developer position at Shine Logics, and what was your role in developing the AI-based interview preparation tool?

It seems we had a greeting already! Let's dive into the interview then.

Can you tell me more about your experience with the Full Stack Developer position at Shine Logics, and what was your role in developing the AI-based interview preparation tool?
